home.heroTitle: Discover the Essence of Da Nang Culinary
home.heroDescription: Da Nang cuisine - a sophisticated blend of Central Vietnam's flavors. From hearty Mi Quang noodles and crispy Banh Xeo to the freshest seafood. A vibrant and unforgettable culinary journey.
home.cuisineDescription: Explore Da Nang's cuisine with distinctive Central Vietnamese flavors, where delicious dishes from mountains to sea converge, offering a unique and diverse culinary experience.
home.bannerDescription: Explore Da Nang's cuisine with distinctive Central Vietnamese flavors, where delicious dishes from mountains to sea converge, offering a unique and diverse culinary experience.
home.noRestaurants: No restaurants available at the moment.

cuisineFeatures.feature1Description: A city where every corner bursts with sizzling flavorsâ€”from night-market bites to seaside grills.
cuisineFeatures.feature2Description: Generations-old recipes keep the soul of Central Vietnam alive in every noodle and broth.
cuisineFeatures.feature3Description: Daily catches from the East Sea bring unmatched freshness to iconic seafood dishes.
cuisineFeatures.feature4Description: Classic Vietnamese taste meets global influence, crafting bold and unique experiences.

ourStory.title: The Story of
ourStory.subtitle: A journey born from passion for local cuisine and the desire to transform how people discover Da Nang's delicious flavors.
ourStory.problemDescription1: Da Nang â€“ a vibrant tourist city with countless restaurants, street food stalls, and local eateries. But how do you find the truly great ones? Information scattered across the internet, conflicting reviews, incorrect addresses, and recommendations from friends aren't always reliable.
ourStory.problemDescription2: Travelers get lost searching. Locals want to discover hidden gems nearby. Great restaurant owners go unnoticed. Culinary information is fragmented, hard to find, and lacks trustworthy centralization.
ourStory.missionDescription1: We â€“ a group of students from Da Nang University of Technology â€“ decided to build something different.
ourStory.missionDescription1Part2: isn't just an app; it's an intelligent culinary map that centralizes accurate, trustworthy, and constantly updated food information.
ourStory.missionDescription2: We want to support three groups: travelers finding real culinary experiences, locals discovering hidden treasures in their own city, and restaurant owners being recognized and valued as they deserve.

value1.title: Interactive Map
value1.description: Discover restaurants on a real map, knowing exactly where they are and how far from you.

value2.title: Smart Search
value2.description: Filter by cuisine type, price range, ratings, or unique specialties of each restaurant.

value3.title: Community Reviews
value3.description: Comments, photos, and feedback from real users who've actually dined there.

value4.title: Personalized Recommendations
value4.description: Our system learns your preferences and suggests restaurants perfectly suited to you.

ourStory.journeyDescription1: From initial ideas, brainstorming sessions, to late-night coding sessions â€“ Danang Culinary Atlas was born from a love of food and technology. We source data from trustworthy locations, verify details meticulously, and built an amazing platform.
ourStory.journeyDescription2: Today, when you use this app, you're not just finding a great restaurant â€“ you're joining a community of people who love and respect local cuisine.
ourStory.ctaDescription: Discover Da Nang's delicious flavors in a smarter way. Every restaurant tells a story, every dish is an experience.
ourStory.footerMessage: With Danang Culinary Atlas, food is more than just a meal â€“ it's a journey of discovery.

about.title: About Recommendation System
about.description: This dashboard provides comprehensive monitoring and management of the AI-powered food recommendation engine. The system uses advanced machine learning algorithms to recommend dishes and restaurants based on user preferences, context (time of day), and historical behavior. Regular training ensures the model stays up-to-date with the latest user interactions.
